des:
You can easily control your home lighting and other devices hands free with Alexa. Just say it, GXMSmart will obey.

Here's a step by step guide:
(1). Download our "GXMSmart" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2). Launch the app and register a new account;
(3). Turn on GXMSmart devices and connect them with "GXMSmart" app;
(4). Configure these devices in "GXMSmart" app and change the appropriate name for your devices;
(5). Download the Amazon "Alexa" app in Google Play or iOS App Store, and cocnnect Echo with "Alexa" app;
(7). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "GXMSmart";
(8). Click Enable skill of "GXMSmart", then input your userename, password on the login page;
(9). Talk to Echo "Alexa, discover devices". Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(10). Now all setup is done.

Here are the voice commands "GXMSmart" has:

Light:
"Alexa,discover my devices."
"Alexa,turn on the light."
"Alexa,turn off the bedroom light."
"Alexa,set the bedroom light to 50%."
"Alexa,brighten the bedroom light to 50%."
"Alexa,dim the bedroom light to 50%."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."

Switch:
"Alexa,turn on the bedroom switch."
"Alexa,turn off the bedroom switch."

Curtain:
"Alexa,turn on the bedroom curtain."
"Alexa,turn off the bedroom curtain."

Socket:
"Alexa,turn on the bedroom socket."
"Alexa,turn off the bedroom socket."
